channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Various nature of waste to be removed, 2nd December
item.description:
Good morning team, last night the cardboard boxes have been removed, but the TV and the plastic bins are still there. On top, a wooden pallet, a small trolley and other rubbish has been added. Could you please assist with removing everything? Thanks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King John Court, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van with fake plates abandoned in road for over 2 months, 2nd December
item.description:
Van has been parked outside church hall for over 2 months. Checked number plate to see if MOT compliant but it did not recognise the number plate. I believe these could be fake plates.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ardgowan Road, Catford South, Greater London

item.title: Multiple bollards and signs out, 2nd December
item.description:
There are multiple signs and bollards out May need a night scout P89 B15? (Hasn’t been coded since 2008!!) B14? (Hasn’t been coded since 2008!!) B124 B3285 B13 P91 There maybe more!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
